| HistoryText             = The Lethal Legion was a super-villain team gathered by [[Eric Williams (Earth-616)|Grim Reaper]] to defeat the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]]. They captured [[T'Challa (Earth-616)|Black Panther]] after having kidnapped his girlfriend [[Monica Lynne (Earth-616)|Monica Lynne]], but were defeated after Grim Reaper freed the [[Vision (Earth-616)|Vision]], having discovered that he possessed his brother [[Simon Williams (Earth-616)|Simon]]'s brain-wave patterns.{{r|Avengers #79}}

[[File:Avengers Vol 1 79.jpg|thumb|left|The original team]]
The Reaper later reformed the Lethal Legion in partnership with [[Ultron (Earth-616)|Ultron]] to attack the West Coast branch of the Avengers.{{r|West Coast Avengers Vol 2 #1|2}}{{r|{{cl|Vision and the Scarlet Witch Vol 2 1}}-[[Vision and the Scarlet Witch Vol 2 1|2]]}}

During Norman Osborn's Dark Reign, Reaper reformed the Legion with super-villains who had vendettas with Osborn, along with his brother Wonder Man. After they were defeated it was revealed that Reaper was acting under Osborn's orders in order to make Osborn's Avengers look better than the original Avengers.{{r|Dark Reign: Lethal Legion #1|3}}
